content.html:
Hi there!

Thanks for coming back to the blog after my unexpected six-month break. It‚Äôs crazy to think it‚Äôs been that long since my last writing-related post!

So, you‚Äôre probably wondering what the hell happened. Especially after everything was going so well. A quick recap of what was going so great: I‚Äôd finished writing Running the Asset way ahead of schedule, racking up insane daily word counts, and then I decided to dive straight into the editing stage.

Yeah, you‚Äôve probably guessed what happened. If you followed my daily updates, you could probably see it coming.

Me, nope‚Ä¶ well‚Ä¶ even if I did, I ignored it.

Continue reading ‚ÄúMy Unexpected Six-Month Break‚Äú
